attributes.action: Continue Driving Tests and Driving Lessons
attributes.additional_details: Children are allowed to go to school and surround themselves with over 30 people but driving instructors are not able to see people 1 to 1 with a face mask? It does not make sense. Many people have spent more money on lessons in order to catch up on their learning from the last lockdown. People will be robbed of their freedom and many people are wanting to pass their driving tests in order to go to university next year.
attributes.background: Allow driving lessons and driving tests to go ahead.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
